panels.description: Shows processes which are consuming more than 70% of the node CPU.
panels.title: Offending processes - High node CPU utilisation

panels.description: Shows processes which are consuming more than 70% of the node memory.
panels.title: Offending processes - High node memory utilisation

panels.description: Shows network interfaces on each node which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s bandwidth (download).
panels.title: Network I/O - Download

panels.description: Shows network interfaces on each node which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s bandwidth (upload)
panels.title: Network I/O - Upload

panels.description: Shows disks  on each node which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s disk read bandwidth
panels.title: Disk I/O - Read

panels.description: Shows disks  on each node which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s disk write bandwidth
panels.title: Disk I/O - Write

targets.expr: sum by (serviceName, container)({error=~"Error: read ECONNRESET", cluster="$cluster"})
sum by (serviceName, container)({error=~"Error: socket hang up", cluster="$cluster"})

panels.title: ECONNRESET and Socket hang up ERRORs

panels.description: Shows mojaloop pods which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s network download bandwidth
panels.title: Mojaloop pods Network I/O - Download

panels.description: Shows mojaloop pods which are consuming more than 1 MiB/s network upload bandwidth
panels.title: Mojaloop pods Network I/O - Upload

panels.description: Shows the no. of partitions for each topic
panels.title: Partition count w-r-t topic

panels.description: Shows the no. of consumers in each consumer group
panels.title: Consumers count  w-r-t consumer group

panels.description: Shows the maximum lag (in message count) faced by a consumer in given (consumergroup,topic).
panels.title: Max consumer group lag
